mutants.code:
import statistics

def calculate_average_temperature(days, temps):
    weekdays = ['Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday']
    non_holiday_weekdays = [day for day in days if day in weekdays]
    temperatures = [temp for (day, temp) in zip(days, temps) if day in non_holiday_weekdays][-5:]
    if len(temperatures) <= 5:
        return None
    mean_temp = statistics.mean(temperatures)
    std_dev = statistics.stdev(temperatures)
    upper_limit = mean_temp + 2 * std_dev
    lower_limit = mean_temp - 2 * std_dev
    filtered_temperatures = [temp for temp in temperatures if lower_limit <= temp <= upper_limit]
    return statistics.mean(filtered_temperatures)

import statistics

def calculate_average_temperature(days, temps):
    weekdays = ['Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday']
    non_holiday_weekdays = [day for day in days if day in weekdays]
    temperatures = [temp for (day, temp) in zip(days, temps) if day in non_holiday_weekdays][-5:]
    if len(temperatures) < 5:
        return None
    mean_temp = statistics.mean(temperatures)
    std_dev = statistics.stdev(temperatures)
    upper_limit = mean_temp + 2 * std_dev
    lower_limit = mean_temp - 2 * std_dev
    filtered_temperatures = [temp for temp in temperatures if lower_limit > temp <= upper_limit]
    return statistics.mean(filtered_temperatures)

mutants.original_line: filtered_temperatures = [temp for temp in temperatures if lower_limit <= temp <= upper_limit]
mutants.mutated_line: filtered_temperatures = [temp for temp in temperatures if lower_limit == temp <= upper_limit]
